amendment.description: Amendment directs States to equalize polling hours across the state within certain parameters. Also, provides exceptions for municipalities to set longer hours.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to direct States to equalize polling hours across the state within certain parameters. Provides exceptions for municipalities to set longer hours.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 188 (Roll no. 115).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Brindisi.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 188 (Roll no. 115).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
